content.detailedDescription: My wife daughter and i were on our way home that night. we got a few miles from our house. then i seen a bright light in the sky. i ask my wife do you see that. that's when my daughter said i see it daddy i see it. we followed it for maybe a minute or two. then it just took off out of sight. as we entered our neighborhood we seen it again. that's when i pulled the car over. i got out and started recording with my iphone. my wife said come on get in the car. when we pulled in the driveway that's when my little girl ran out of the car and said daddy i see it i see it. that's when we started see helicopters. at first we just thought there was one. but then we started counting them and it was about four or five helicopters. it seemed they had set up some kind of rotation with each other. that's when the lights in the sky started moving again. then we started to see more lights moving. my daughter said that is not a star. stars don't change colors. then they took off. there was about four or five that we seen. it seemed the one we followed was the main one. the the other lights followed that one and was gone.
content.summary: There were about 4-5 lights in the sky on 3-3-16 in houston texas

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my back deck in san ramon early this morning and thought i would take pictures of a beautiful sunrise after a storm last night. when i came in to my room to look at my pictures i saw a light that i initially thought was a star. however, i took the pictures one right after the other and saw that the bright object had moved significantly. when i enlarged the picture it almost looks like a bright greenish yellow bell shaped object. i thought, hmmm this is very interesting and not quite normal. i take pictures regularly from my deck.

i felt excited about seeing the object in my pictures.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the sun rise from my back deck early this morning and evidently captured something that first wasn't in the picture but then showed up in the next one and then moved in the next picture. i took the pictures in a matter of seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Witness a went out onto the front porch of her home to collect some firewood for her wood stove and noticed something unusual so she called for her husband (witness b) to come look. witness b, a certified pilot, thought to pull up the flight weather icing report off the noaa website because he and his wife both saw 4 red lights, while the radar only showed a snow front moving through. the airport reported ceilings at 7000 ft. with winds at 120 degrees and 9 knots. both witnesses saw what seemed to be 4 objects moving with the wind then ascending into the clouds, slowly. witness b is confident they weren't airplanes as no airplane would be flying that slow and entering known heavy icing, especially at the direction they were moving. they were traveling from se to nw, which is not in the pattern for this particular airport. they appeared to move from se of the airport to directly over the airport or perhaps just this side of the runway nearest the group of buildings before disappearing.  whether the lights just turned off or they ascended into the clouds and were no longer visible neither witness can say for certain. but there's no doubt they weren't airplanes,because they wouldn't be traveling in a group like that and deliberately flying into icing when they could have stayed below 7000 ft. for just a short time to remain below the clouds until they were past the front. nor would an airplane ever turn off their navigation lights. both witnesses said they were excited but never afraid during this event. witness b does not rule out the possibility of the objects being either weather balloons released by the airport manager or chinese lanterns possibly released by a local farmer and his family.
content.summary: Four red lights observed hovering then ascending over the municipal airport

content.detailedDescription: I had just dropped off my granddaughter and was heading home when i noticed the light in the sky.  they looked peculiar to me so i stopped and video them on my cell phone.
content.summary: Noticed in sky as i was driving home

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I was biking past a local school by my house around 11:30 an i heard what i thought at first was plane going over my head but i looked up to see what it was an i couldn't find any thing up in the sky but i could head the sound change directions so i stayed an tried looking for it a bit more after about 5 mins the sounds started to go away but it then came back behind me an this time when i looked up i saw it it was an invisible shaped boomerang craft with sharp sides as soon as i saw it i tried taking a video but my camera is bad an just took a black photo of the sky an the craft flew outa eye sight. it seemed as tho the craft was looking for some thing an i felt i could only head it cause i live in canada an it was so could that night i could almost hear the could air hitting of the sides of this enormis craft. ill link the black video i took to see if u get any thing outa it
content.summary: I saw an heard invisible boomerang shaped craft well biking past one of my neighborhood schools

content.detailedDescription: Je sortais dehors après une pratique de musique pour mon band lorsque cette objet est apparue assez loin mais très brillant changeant d'intensité avance lentement ressemble à du plasma en mouvement
content.summary: Seems for me plasma on the move but glowing changing

content.detailedDescription:
When i take pictures faces of spirits are attracted to my body. this is an occurrance that i started to notice in november 2016. it has intensified and more recently my face has started to transform to what appears to me alien like features.

you will see just orbs with one horizontal line running through it in the first photo. pay close attention to the photos because my faces transform to resemble the orbs in the following two photos.

in the last photo my face also transformed to an alien looking being unlike the one with the line running through it.  this photo was taken at a different time and date than the first three photos.
content.summary: My face transformed

content.detailedDescription: My first sighting on date moon sizes little one behind it
content.summary: Moon sizes

content.detailedDescription: My second sighting on date
content.summary: Glowing disc

content.detailedDescription: Second time in two weeks i observed a rectangle shaped, bright white object over the atlantic ocean- observed from the beach. this time it moved further east from start to finish until i left the beach. it disappeared once during the 30 minutes i was observing it. there were 4 witnesses including me.
content.summary: Rectangle object over the ocean, possibly several miles out

content.detailedDescription:
3/5/2016 1:20am lake devernia

i was traveling eastbound on hwy 80 just between gladewater and white oak.  i noticed a very large red object in my rear view mirror. i thought it could have been a life flight helicopter and dismissed the object as that.  roughly 30 seconds go by and i notice the object is now getting much closer than it was when i first viewed it.

again, i dismissed it as possibly just a life flight helicopter and continued to drive. the object closed in within 50 to 100ft of my vehicle and i then noticed that i heard no helicopter or aircraft sound.  as the object was coming up behind my vehicle, it turned on some sort of white "spotlight" or bright white light that illuminated the entire road beneath the object.  then it moved directly over my vehicle and matched my speed, staying above my vehicle for the duration of this experience.

i pulled my car over on eastbound side of hwy 80 in the middle of the bridge leading over lake devernia. my wife was with me during this event and once i started to pull over, she became extremely upset and scared and asked me to please just continue to drive and not to stop.  once i came to a complete stop, i opened my door, stepped out of my vehicle and tried to better observe this object.  there was a very distinct "hum", almost like a hum you would hear coming from a street lamp.  very consistent and very unique sound.

i used my left arm to shield my eyes to try and get more details on the craftds.  on each wing tip, there white lights.  the cavity the lights were in looked like someone taking a scoop out of an ice cream bowl.  the light itself looked to come from further back in this recess.  the object was a flat black looking metallic skin.  the only reflective item on this object was the circle around the red light/hugely bright white light coming directly from the center of the undercarriage of the vehicle.  when i observed it, it would have been "red/white light in recess, reflective black metallic material forming a circle, almost exactly like a recess light in your home.  the housing for the light would be identical to what i saw on this craft.  

the best description i can give on how i felt during this is like when you put a 9v battery to your tongue, that metallic/static/uncomfortable feeling is what the whole area felt like to me.  while looking at the craft, there seemed to be something that made the outer edge look like what pavement looks like on a hot summer day.  there was absolutely no wind or prop wash coming off of this object, just the electric sounding hum.

after a few minutes of seeing the object while out of my car, it slowly gain roughly 100ft in altitude, looking like it was moving sideways or "crab walking" back toward the west where i originally saw the red light, it flew over some tree tops and out of my line of sight.  as i sat back down into the car, my wife was hysterical.  extremely afraid, extremely shocked and frantic.  i started driving east again and within seconds started to feel as if i were sunburned.  my face/left arm were the only parts of my body that felt this way.  it was identical to how a sunburn feels.  it felt like it radiated heat, was warmer to the touch than any other part of my body and yet there was no sunburn.  my arm/face looked perfectly fine, but felt as tho they had been burned.

there are other details to this event that will remain untold unless it's directly to a mufon detective.  never in my life have i ever experienced something like this.  if anyone else witnessed this craft, please come forward also and lets get this on record.  not only was this the biggest vehicle i have ever seen, it was the scariest thing i have ever witnessed.
content.summary: Sighted in rear view mirror of vehicle.  went from several miles away to above my vehicle in seconds.

content.detailedDescription: My friend t.C. asked me to come outside on the deck to see this light moving. he said he didn't know a helicopter to move like that. what i was observing was a star like object moving in up and down and crossways directions. orion was to the right of this light movement.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: it looked like a bright star that moved up and down and diaginaly, when stopped could see colored lights on bottom. i

content.detailedDescription:
As passenger driving westbound on lie, saw bright flash of light across entire sky just prior to exit 62. looked up saw 5 lights in circular or pentagon pattern. initial thought was it was a plane. lights were stationary and had no movement. lights were visible for 30 seconds to a minute. driver of vehicle indicated that 3 lights were visible to them. driver stated that lights were in a chevron pattern. driver indicated that the lights were large and reddish/orange. looked away for a second and when looking back lights were gone. after exiting lie, when heading south on nichols road lights were not in field of vision and could not be found in area.  upon arrival at destination( island 16 cinemas ) exited car and could not locate the same lights in sky. patrons exiting theatre informed us that a transformer had blown. there was no smoke present and no sound of an explosion heard. 
there is an airport west of the location of sighting. the flight pattern of other planes was present in the area.
content.summary: While travelling west on the lie saw bright flash of light, looked up and saw 5 lights in pentagon pattern.

content.detailedDescription: July of 2015. a friend and i were discing at the sugar camp disc golf course. we were on hole 11 when my buddy said. mike what's that. i looked to where he was pointing and there was a silent silver shinyobject cruising along. we observed no wings no noise. i walked towards it trying to get a better view so i could snap pictures with my phone. i got two off before it went behind some clouds and i never saw it again.  the craft was cigar shaped. looked to be a reflective metal. made no noise. it was clearly viable to the naked eye. i was excited. not the first time i have witnessed an unknown object in the sky. hope this was detailed enough for you. the pictures are pretty bad. one is zoomed in the other is not. i hope you have some equipment that may clear it up for you. thanks for your time.
content.summary: Buddy saw it. pointed it out. i snapped a few photos with my phone. which aren't good.

content.detailedDescription: 9 pm out on deck when i noticed three ufos wing shaped no noise with red and silver light in an odd formation one above each other.  they were gliding and moving around each other. as like magic one by one each one just vanished.  one appeared to have merged into the other.  this is why i knew they were not air planes or helicopters. the local airport would not permit such a formation. i immediately called my wife and 4 other witnesses out on the deck.  we filmed the event.  the film was not as revealing as to what we saw with our own eyes. this is my first sighting. i am shaken up a bit.
content.summary: Three in horizontal formation

content.detailedDescription:
it was about 2 a.M. and i had just returned upstairs to try to sleep after some prior hours of tossing and turning in bed.  i was just getting in bed when  startled by a very bright white light coming down from the skylight above my bed. i looked up and was able to discern what appeared to be the underneath of a large object with five large white lights. it took up more than a quarter of the width of the skylight and was shaped like an octagon. it appeared to be flying low, perhaps no more than two to five hundred feet above the house. i was able to clearly see the positioning of the lights with one in the middle and the remaining four positioned adjacent to the four corners of the octagon. they appeared large and were the same size. they were very bright and very white.  the object made almost no noise at all except for a small sound emanating from within it.  i am unable to describe the sound easily or with any degree of accuracy except to state what it did not sound like. the noise a helicopter airplane or drone would not come close to describing this sound.  
   there was no time to take a picture or video as the whole incident only lasted the few seconds it took for the object to fly over my skylight.
content.summary: Bright light shot thru my skylight in  my bedroom  2am, i looked up and saw object's bottom with 5 lights

content.detailedDescription:
At 2000 hrs on 3/5/2016 i was walking my dog on a dimly lit street. i was walking due east, when something caught my eye in the sky. it was a silent bright glowing orange ball with a trail that was leaving flashes behind it. the ball was going due north, didn't change direction but did arch. it disappeared as silently and cleanly into the night as it appeared. the sighting was 5 seconds long. it was the altitude of a small plane. there was no sound, and no other planes in that altitude or area at the time. 
i am about one block from patrick airforce base, and it was headed in that exact direction.
content.summary: Bright orange glowing perfect ball going directly north with no sound. disappeared into the darkness. had a trail with, not a smoke trail but a flashing trail.

content.detailedDescription:
Making a delivery.  there were hundreds of yellow/white orbs in the sky.  they looked like stars but were moving at a very high speed.  initially appeared to be stars, but they were all moving.  also, some of the orbs were rainbow color.  the orbs were above cloud level.  thought they might be planes, but there were many of them, mostly flying in synchronized formation. there were also planes flying below these orbs, so definitely were not planes.  not drones either -- they were so well lit!! 

please investigate this.
content.summary: Hundreds of orbs of light, appeared like stars which were moving in unison.  no tail.  some orbs were colorful.  many flew with 3 orbs together with equal distance between them.

content.detailedDescription: Visiting blackness castle near linlithgow in scotland on the 5th march 2016. taking many photos with the sun setting behind me. the shutter rate on my camera was very high 2500th of a second on f9 stop. on one of my photos i noticed 2 glowing objects taken at 17:25 greenwich mean time. these objects only showed in one of my photos. blackness castle is near bonnybridge and the falkirk triangle a hot spot for ufo sightings.
content.summary: Blackness castle ufo's 5th march 2016

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on rt 413 in bucks county 5-10 minutes from newtown, pa.  looking at sky because of all of the chemtrails that morning.  saw object right between chemtrails that formed a perfect z, which i noticed after the object disappeared.  only saw object for about 5 seconds, it didn't move, just disappeared. 

 it looked like there were windows on the side., half sphere shaped, flat side facing down. it looked white, and shiny, reflected the sunlight.  i stopped the car and watched for it to reappear for a few minutes.  i wanted to see it again, maybe get a picture.  

i had been taking pictures of the sky from my car and from the parking lot of a bakery that i had gone to.  i do that because of the chemtrails, i have a facebook page regarding geoengineering and chemtrails, and participated in a march against them. try to get people to learn about them. i knew after a second or two that it was a ufo.  

first i thought it might be a plane.  but it wasn't moving and didn't have wings.
content.summary: half sphere shaped, below/ among chemtrails

content.detailedDescription: my son went with his grandmother from burgdorf to bern. he saw a floating object on the highway. because he always has his iphone in his hands, he make the picture of the ufo. can you see it? left side up.
content.summary: Hobered over the highway a1 -zürich-bern

content.detailedDescription:
Cuando estaba en la ruta de entrada al puerto de punta loyola transitando con mi vehiculo y pasaba por frente a las casillas de los pescadores del lugar vi que habia tres pescadores al lado de otro vehiculo y haciendo gestos y señalando para el lado de la entrada de la ria, detuve mi vehiculo en la banquina y me baje porque vi a esta gente muy alterada.
estaban a los gritos señalando dos luces muy azules como de color electrico que estaban quietas frente a los acantilados de la otra orilla de la desembocadura de la ria del rio gallegos, tome mi celular y comence a filmar pero estaba muy lejos y ademas esta gente gritaba.
entonces me subi a mi vehiculo nuevamente y segui adelante hasta la zona de los depositos de carbon de ycrt que dan a la playa frente a los acantilados que antes mencione, me baje corriendo y segui filmando con mi celular.
las luces se estaban moviendo, lo hacian muy rapido y haciendo curvas cerradas subian y bajaban, por momentos desaparecian atrás de los acantilados hacia el norte y despues volvian a aparecer, subian hacia arriba y volvian a bajar hasta casi tocar el agua, la marea estaba alta y el clima estaba cambiante, por ahi habia sol y por ahi se ocultaba, a veces caia alguna lluvia leve pero era un dia con buen tiempo.
estuve filmando por casi 25 minutos, en un momento las luces ya se habian desplazado mas hacia el sur y estaban directamente sobre la boca de la desembocadura de la ria, hicieron un movimiento como girando una sobre la otra, se quedaron quietas por un segundo y comenzaron a subir mas lento en un angudo de unos 45 grados con dirección al sur, a mi derecha, siguiendo la linea de la costa pero como adentrándose hacia el mar.
las filme hasta que ya no pude verlas en la pantalla del celular.
me subi a mi vehiculo, volvi a la ruta donde estaba antes y me quede adentro mirando el video donde se veia las luces ir y venir, se me acerco un pescador y me pregunto si habia filmado eso y le dije que si y le mostre el video, me pidio que si se lo podia mandar y me dio su correo electronico, le dije que no tenia problemas.
todo esto paso como al mediodia y duro menos de media hora, yo estuve en punta loyola hasta como las 19 horas; como a las 15 horas estuve mirando de nuevo el video e hice una captura de imagen donde se veian bien las dos luces y se la mande a mi hijo, a eso de las 18 horas vinieron dos hombres y una mujer en una camioneta blanca y estuvieron preguntando si alguien habia visto algo raro ese dia, un pescador le dijo que yo habia filmado unas luces y me vinieron a ver.
les mostré el video grabado y me preguntaron si le podía cambiar el celular tal como estaba por otro celular nuevo, me pareció raro pero igual les pregunte que celular me darian, entonces buscaron en la camioneta una caja y me ofrecieron un celular samsung s6 edge, aca en rio gallegos no se consigue y además es caro, la caja estaba cerrada de fabrica y les pregunté si era liberado, me contestaron que si. asi que no lo dude y les entregue mi celular a cambio de ese.
cuando volvi a casa recupere la imagen que habia sacado del video y un par de dias despues se la mande al pescador y a algunos amigos, hoy vi que el pescador que le dicen el gordo habia publicado algo aca en mufon asi que ahora yo cuento mi parte y ademas agrego la imagen y otra imagen que es un detalle aumentado donde se ven las dos luces perfectamente.
me recomendaron hablar con una persona aca en rio gallegos que parece que sabe mucho de todo esto pero no la pude encontrar.
hable estos dias con muchas personas de punta loyola y varios, incluso personal de prefectura dicen que esos ovnis y luces a veces se ven incluso de noche mas hacia el este mar adentro y que hay muchas historia en el lugar.
yo siempre tuve dudas de que los ovnis existieran, nunca le di mucha importancia al asunto pero ahora se que es verdad, lei varias noticias locales y uno ve que la gente es burra y se burla de todo, no voy a mentir yo hacia lo mismo antes, seria mejor que la gente piense dos veces las pavadas que escriben porque a cualquiera nos pude pasar de ver ovnis en cualquier momento.
content.summary: Filme dos ovnis en punta loyola

content.detailedDescription:
Large space debris spotted entering the atmosphere. you can see the contrail, and further in the video you see the contrail spiral which led me to believe whatever came in was spiraling in. lighting was horrible as the sun was below the horizon. at the end of the video you see the second glow real bright near the water while the main debris continues on. very hard to see on a phone, easier to see hd on a pc.

lost sight because they either finished burning up in the atmosphere or they went out of sight.

video of sighting:

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Space debris

content.detailedDescription: A clear night,just wanted to see the asteroid,had my binoculars,took garbage out then began to look,foundout i was day early"the 4th",for the asteroid,due on the 5th.I will be looking again tonight.I actualy saw many stange lights, none moveing,but not like stars. then i lookd s.E.,for orions belt, then down a little to the heel. out of same direction, i saw what appeared to be a delta shaped row of lights moveing n.E.,very fast,no sound, high altitude, :my opinion:, i turned to see it again and it was gone,it took one half second to turn around,i had no time to raise my binoculars,should have been faintly visible anyway,this thing seemed structured,the lights never waivered,all attached to the same thing. first shock and awe, then bewilderment, the hair on my arms stood up,i tried to tell family,and was told it was trump one,ha ha. having seen many videos on youtube,ie. ufo lue, there are same shapes in some of his videos, but on nightvision. absolutely did not need any of that to see this, my cell phone not working right,reach me at 1-810-985-4361. i hope someone else saw this. also it may have been moveing in direction of apena mi. afb.
content.summary: Came frm orion,gone bfor i turnd around,delta shaped lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear mufon team,

back in july of 2009 or 2010 (i can confirm the exact dates if requires) i've went to egypt for vacations and i was watching the pyramids light and sound show from my room balcony.

after shooting several pictures of the show, i've just be there and appreciate the show.
later on, when i was checking the photos i've notice some anomaly in one of the photos. an object seams to be present, and when i say object its because is not a reflection of the lights, i have other photos in the same light conditions (i will send if required) where the object is not present. also, another couple that we meet on this trip stated that they spot the same object and see it moving quite slow for a aircraft and make no sound like an helicopter. 

i have this photo for quite a time and didn't show it to anybody besides my wife and the couple that confirmed that it was what they saw.

can you please test it to be sure its not an aircraft or some other phenomena.

thanks and regards

luis
content.summary: Cigar shapped with lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was at borough market,near cathedral street, london uk, taking photographs of the top of the nearby building,the shard. 

on closer inspection of the photographs, i noticed that a progressive path of unidentified objects was recorded on the several images that were taken. they were clearly visible above the pinnacle of the shard. the time was approximately 4.30pm.

in extreme close-up, the object to the far right has a clearer structure - perhaps metallic. i was using an i-phone 6 – i’m almost certain that these are not internal light reflections; i take lots of photographs and have never observed this phenomenon before or since.
content.summary: Five ufos photographed above the shard, london on december 12th 2015.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were watching the fire works.I noticed something above the fireworks and pointed it out. then i started recording it while we argued about what it was. then it flew away. it wasn't until later that i went and reviewed it slowed down and blown up and b u can clearly see a silver cube rotating in the sky. my kid also has a video of it.
content.summary: Cube shaped rotating

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home i observed 2 bright lights of a different color than usual (bright copper/gold like)   at short distance. i noticed that they were not moving, just stood there for a couple of minutes until one of them simply vanished. the other vanished as well after a couple of seconds.
content.summary: Not moving 2 bright lights at short distance from each other

content.detailedDescription: I am a professional school bus driver and happened to have been driving the company van. while returning to base, i was just doing some video glass recording when i have interesting things to look at. i discovered the ufo the next day after looking at my recording. my aid (barbara kessler) pointed out the ufo to me when she was watching it the day after we recorded it.
content.summary: Surprise discovery while videoing driving

content.detailedDescription: i was standind outside just watching the sky i then noticed something red moving i thought it was a plane but then planes dont move like the object i saw, please excuse my grammar im not really allowed to use computer at home im at the library and the time is running out you can give me a call and i will describe it with detail and this is not the first time i have seen something like that my phone is shut down most of the time so just text me and i will call you back as soon as i can im not 18 years old but i feel that its important that you know please contact me as soon as you can
content.summary: It was red and white it was not a plane it blinked in and out of existance
